content: the eden angel crochet pattern is a delightful project that will bring joy to any crocheter s collection this easy-level pattern creates a charming angel standing at 6 75 inches tall not including the halo and 3 5 inches wide the intricate details of the skirt and wings make this angel a unique and beautiful addition to your holiday decor or gift-giving the pattern is written and easy to follow making it suitable for crocheters of all skill levels **unique features-** easy-level pattern suitable for all skill levels detailed instructions for creating a charming angel with intricate details uses bernat super value solids yarn for a soft and durable finish finished angel stands at 6 75 inches tall and 3 5 inches wide perfect for holiday decor or gift-giving **materials needed-** yarn bernat super value solids new in aran weight 89 yards hook 4mm us size 6 0 **this pattern is available for free on my website which is monetized by ads if you prefer an ad-free version of the pattern it is available to purchase from my pattern shop ** ♥ rhondda instagram https //www instagram com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ https //www instagram com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ instagram reels https
